bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Mrs. George Carroll, April 26, 1954

div1.p: Hench informs Mrs. Carroll that she is to receive the Finlay medal from the Cuban Embassy in Washington, D.C.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to Mrs. George Carroll, April 26, 1954
div1.opener:
April 26, 1954
Mrs. George S. H. Carroll
2814 Rhode Island Avenue N.E.
Washington, D. C.
My dear Mrs. Carroll:
div1.p:
I have heard from Doctor Nogueira of Cuba and from the Cuban Embassy
that the little ceremony of presenting the Finlay Condecoracions is
to be held at the Cuban Embassy this Thursday. I have been invited
to attend and participate and feel very highly honored, but I am re-
covering from virus pneumonia and cannot come.

Doctor Nogueira wired me asking for your address. I wired him the
other day but I have two Washington addresses for him and hope that
my information did not go to the wrong place. Presumably Dr. Pedro
Nogueira is at the Roger-Smith Hotel but he asked me to wire him your
address to the Pan-American Sanitary Bureau, 1501 New Hampshire Avenue,
H.W., Washington. If, per chance, you have not heard from them, please
by all means, telephone the Roger-Smith Hotel and try to contact Doctor
Nogueira, giving him your address. If you do not reach him (he will be
attending a medical meeting at the Pan-American Sanitary Bureau), may
I suggest that you call the Cuban Embassy and tell the chief clerk
who you are and about the little ceremony as I know they are very
anxious to get in touch with you. I do hope you will have a very
pleasant time on Thursday and I shall be thinking of you all.

I have sent copies of the photographs you loaned me to two or three of
the survivors of the yellow fever experiments and will let you know
that they say. I am keeping the original photographs very carefully
and will either mail them to you, registered post, or will save them
and bring them with me to Washington the next time I come, whichever
you want me to do.
div1.closer:
Sincerely yours, P. S. Hench, M.D. PSH:alc
